entry.title: New release for Undb: v1.0.0-140

entry.title: New release for Undb: v1.0.0-142
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Merge main into develop branch by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/2203
  • fix: fix some filter issue; by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/2205
  • feat: mysql by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/2204
  • Merge main into develop branch by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/2207
  • Update README.md by @g8d3 in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/2208
  • feat: 优化 Webhook 组件和条件处理 by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/2214
  • Release version v1.0.0-142 by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/2215

New Contributors

  • @g8d3 made their first contribution in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/2208

Full Changelog: https://github.com/undb-io/undb/compare/v1.0.0-141...v1.0.0-142
